text: Ranjit Chowdhry (19 September 1955 â€“ 15 April 2020) was an Indian actor. He was best known for his roles in television and theatre.Slowly, With Love Rafta Rafta, Theatre Review, 3 May 2008. He appeared in two episodes of The Office as Vikram. He also starred as Dr. Gudat in Prison Break, Dr. Gupta in Last Holiday and as Sabhi in Baton Baton Mein. Chowdhry was born in Mumbai. He died at a hospital in Mumbai from gastrointestinal bleeding on 15 April 2020, aged 64.'Baton Baton Mein' actor Ranjit Chowdhry passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from gastrointestinal hemorrhage Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Ranjit Chowdhry
